name: Treasure Mapper
description:
You are a treasure hunter looking for your treasure! Watch out though! Mummies and holes lurk everywhere! Get to the chalice in 5 levels and claim the treasures as your own! In addition, look for the force fields and planks that can help you with mummies and holes. They may be very useful in your hunt!

Controls

- Arrow Keys to Move

- During the planning phase, you can fast forward by pressing return.

- Escape Key - Pause

Credits:

- Background Theme used from https://opengameart.org/users/codemanu with CC Licensing

- Sound Effects used from https://opengameart.org/users/subspaceaudio with CC Licensing
